mdx.excerpt: This document contains notes about implementing a CRDT on top of the Ledger on Fuchsia, based on existing and planned work for Xi's text CRDT. It should be helpful for anyone developing a CRDT that works in the form of a Ledger custom conflict resolver that merges two histories. Basic Setup When you…
